title: Analysis of Plant Nutrition Learning Mental Models and Instructional Design Development

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Aims to diagnose students' mental models stage-by-stage and establish personalized instructional strategies by applying a mixed research method combining phenomenological analysis and item response theory

learning_goals: Students can systematically express their mental models about plant nutrition through a five-item open-ended survey
Learners can compare and evaluate three-tiered (basic-intermediate-advanced) thinking frameworks about plant nutrition by analyzing peers' mental models
Students can derive learning needs by analyzing differences between scientific consensus models and their own mental models
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
